title: Citycapital
author: Citycapital
content: Hi, Im not here to tell anyone where to invest or how to invest or give any suggestions about financial decisions.Little bit about my background: I been trading crypto and Im self learner and i been learning about finances.I can make conclusions by looking the indicators and gepolitical events on the macro economical scale and i think it's wonderful.Im looking for people to connect and reach to success together by sharing ideas and knowledge and who knows maybe one day we could meet up or Even make our own hedge fund or large successful financial instution. I'd like to have conversations with others about finances and situation when we can make profit on forex commodities or with crypto.We could also share the new ideas together so Im looking for people like me the people who want to make money by analyzing the world and how it can have impact over the financial field.Btw.. it's always Nice to find and meet with people who's interested about same things.LET me tell one more time i don't want to sell anything or give any economy or financial predictions Im looking for people with who i can discuss about reasons not just give out ptedictions or suggestions to invest or buy anything.One of the most interesting topics are forex the geopolitical events can have large impact over the fiat currencies and that's interesting for me so i'd like to share with Open mind people my formula to predict forex Market.I do little bit the futures trading Also and i invest in presale crypto projects.So i'd like to create the chat group and anyone whos interested about same things can join and we can share together knowledge. Thank you so much guys

comments.author: Fullcoinese
comments.body: Quote from: Citycapital on July 23, 2023, 01:22:23 PMIm looking for people to connect and reach to success together by sharing ideas and knowledge and who knows maybe one day we could meet up or Even make our own hedge fund or large successful financial instution.I'd like to have conversations with others about finances and situation when we can make profit on forex commodities or with crypto.We could also share the new ideas together so Im looking for people like me the people who want to make money by analyzing the world and how it can have impact over the financial field.Btw.. it's always Nice to find and meet with people who's interested about same things.LET me tell one more time i don't want to sell anything or give any economy or financial predictions Im looking for people with who i can discuss about reasons not just give out ptedictions or suggestions to invest or buy anything.what is your true intention and purpose to gather traders and financial experts?. and why do you believe anyone wants or will join your invitation?.if your goal is to discuss and share knowledge in this forum you will even find thousands of people and thousands of minds who will be ready to discuss with you.why would you want to create a special chat room if you are free and can share in this forum?. i think chat rooms in particular are just going to limit participants and thoughts.just submit a statement or question here then let's discuss it together.

comments.author: Citycapital
comments.body: Quote from: Fullcoinese on July 24, 2023, 12:16:24 AMQuote from: Citycapital on July 23, 2023, 01:22:23 PMIm looking for people to connect and reach to success together by sharing ideas and knowledge and who knows maybe one day we could meet up or Even make our own hedge fund or large successful financial instution.I'd like to have conversations with others about finances and situation when we can make profit on forex commodities or with crypto.We could also share the new ideas together so Im looking for people like me the people who want to make money by analyzing the world and how it can have impact over the financial field.Btw.. it's always Nice to find and meet with people who's interested about same things.LET me tell one more time i don't want to sell anything or give any economy or financial predictions Im looking for people with who i can discuss about reasons not just give out ptedictions or suggestions to invest or buy anything.what is your true intention and purpose to gather traders and financial experts?. and why do you believe anyone wants or will join your invitation?.if your goal is to discuss and share knowledge in this forum you will even find thousands of people and thousands of minds who will be ready to discuss with you.why would you want to create a special chat room if you are free and can share in this forum?. i think chat rooms in particular are just going to limit participants and thoughts.just submit a statement or question here then let's discuss it together.The purpose of this chat room Will be to have like my own small group of people like team to discuss together financial decisions to share knowledge with each others. Talking on the chat room on "live" it's much better sometimes then in the forum.But yes we could discuss things here aswell by reasoning things out with facts and theories.

comments.author: ancafe
comments.body: Quote from: Citycapital on July 23, 2023, 01:22:23 PMLET me tell one more time i don't want to sell anything or give any economy or financial predictions Im looking for people with who i can discuss about reasons not just give out ptedictions or suggestions to invest or buy anything.  If that's the reason the bitcoin.talk forum is a more relevant discussion place than you inviting people to join the grub, the credibility of the forum has been sufficiently tested for the level of trust compared to creating a new group for discussion, many people can provide suggestions or input every time you ask or discuss.Quote from: Citycapital on July 23, 2023, 01:22:23 PMOne of the most interesting topics are forex the geopolitical events can have large impact over the fiat currencies and that's interesting for me so i'd like to share with Open mind people my formula to predict forex Market. I don't want to accuse the idea that you are offering as bad, but in my country many people are deceived by ways developed like forex. In the end they are invited to invest regularly with the lure of big profits, but in the end it ended in fraud and many cases have been found in my country.Quote from: Citycapital on July 23, 2023, 01:22:23 PMI do little bit the futures trading Also and i invest in presale crypto projects.  I want to know the criteria of the person you want to join and I also want to hear what kind of trading concept do you run?

comments.author: Citycapital
comments.body: Quote from: ancafe on July 24, 2023, 05:36:45 AMQuote from: Citycapital on July 23, 2023, 01:22:23 PMLET me tell one more time i don't want to sell anything or give any economy or financial predictions Im looking for people with who i can discuss about reasons not just give out ptedictions or suggestions to invest or buy anything.  If that's the reason the bitcoin.talk forum is a more relevant discussion place than you inviting people to join the grub, the credibility of the forum has been sufficiently tested for the level of trust compared to creating a new group for discussion, many people can provide suggestions or input every time you ask or discuss.Quote from: Citycapital on July 23, 2023, 01:22:23 PMOne of the most interesting topics are forex the geopolitical events can have large impact over the fiat currencies and that's interesting for me so i'd like to share with Open mind people my formula to predict forex Market. I don't want to accuse the idea that you are offering as bad, but in my country many people are deceived by ways developed like forex. In the end they are invited to invest regularly with the lure of big profits, but in the end it ended in fraud and many cases have been found in my country.Quote from: Citycapital on July 23, 2023, 01:22:23 PMI do little bit the futures trading Also and i invest in presale crypto projects.  I want to know the criteria of the person you want to join and I also want to hear what kind of trading concept do you run?When it comes to forex i don't trade with leverage that's the extra risk what i don't need If by geopolitical events some currency falling against other currency pairs that's good enough for making profit why would i need to take extra risk by using leverage.Im watching Fed boe and ecb how they move and then i make my decisions.When they cut rates then i know currency falling and commoditie prices going up. Overall after last crash we had dead CAT bounce all over the market. It means that probably 4th quarter we gona have bigger crash.bigger crash Will do the "qt" and usd,gbp,EUR all of them Will be strong.

comments.author: pawel7777
comments.body: Sorry, but you're not coming across as a very serious person when trying to create a group this way.If you were any sort of knowledgeable expert, would you even bother to consider joining a team of a complete stranger (and dedicate your precious time to him)?If you just want to discuss things, why do you want to do it in a closed group? Why not discuss any subject you're interested in publicly, either or this forum or on other ones? This way you could meet similar-minded people naturally, gain some reputation and then build a team (if you need one at all), rather than expect anyone to commit without having a clue who are they even talking to.Just a thought.

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: -    It's not a problem to share good practices about crypto trading, because it really adds to our knowledge. It's just that giving a prediction on a coin in the exchange or trading view is not easy to say that is a prediction because there is no accurate if this is the value that will happen in the future.So I just want to ask, why not here in the forum to give tips about what you want to happen, after all this forum platform is open to everyone, isn't right?

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: Citycapital on July 23, 2023, 01:22:23 PMLET me tell one more time i don't want to sell anything or give any economy or financial predictions Im looking for people with who i can discuss about reasons not just give out ptedictions or suggestions to invest or buy anything.Maybe through some  of the official social media handles of economy and business experienced experts and professionals could be of help to you, you could also create time to read their books, attend their business seminars or you could also create one and invite them to speak and gain their recognition through such means, people don't want to click with those that will not be of importance to them because they realized their time must be vested on quality things.Quote from: Citycapital on July 23, 2023, 01:22:23 PMOne of the most interesting topics are forex the geopolitical events can have large impact over the fiat currencies and that's interesting for me so i'd like to share with Open mind people my formula to predict forex Market.The best advice i could give concerning this is for you to try create your own platform to host such, but before then, you have to build a credible relationship and trust for yourself and for the people to see in you for them to accept your offers.

comments.author: Citycapital
comments.body: Quote from: pawel7777 on July 24, 2023, 04:05:32 PMSorry, but you're not coming across as a very serious person when trying to create a group this way.If you were any sort of knowledgeable expert, would you even bother to consider joining a team of a complete stranger (and dedicate your precious time to him)?If you just want to discuss things, why do you want to do it in a closed group? Why not discuss any subject you're interested in publicly, either or this forum or on other ones? This way you could meet similar-minded people naturally, gain some reputation and then build a team (if you need one at all), rather than expect anyone to commit without having a clue who are they even talking to.Just a thought.It's good to connect Same mind people...dont you think that ? I like to speculate on the markets Im looking for Same.We can teach and improve each other.Im not the biggest expert but i know the basics like how to predict forex currency fluctations by using the kinda simple indicatorsSpecially now when war going on it has impact over Fiat currencies and with my Simple indicators can predict a lot.

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: I like your optimism about someday building your own hedge fund and as well as your financial institution. But if the plan is to create a group, you'll just probably going to be tired of building that outside the forum. This forum is enough for any group related matters whether it's trading or just simple investing in the crypto market. This community is more than what anyone needs. If you are for trading then go ahead on the Trading Discussion and make your own thread there discussing all about your trades in forex and futures.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Conspicuously speaking I don't even know where you are driving to based on your word, I think you need to understand the basics of the forum before your true intentions could be implemented. I don't know your availability and knowledge on forex trading or how rooted are you. And most at times due to trust issues it would be very hard for people to show interest since you are a newbie and many people are afraid of dealing with the beginners and they are mostly insecure dealing with newbie because there's every potential to fall victim.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: I got your point. As others have mentioned you may just engage to this forum to gain knowledge but I do understand that  a peer group would be more interactive and would be more engaging with thoughts and perspective. Problem only is that, if you would just be inviting in this forum, chances are just getting few people with the same interest as you are and more people just wanting to gain something from your group and not having plans to share their idea. Much better if you'd do this on people you personally know and that would makes thing to work, easier.

comments.author: ancafe
comments.body: Quote from: Citycapital on July 24, 2023, 06:30:11 AMWhen it comes to forex i don't trade with leverage that's the extra risk what i don't need If by geopolitical events some currency falling against other currency pairs that's good enough for making profit why would i need to take extra risk by using leverage.Im watching Fed boe and ecb how they move and  :)then i make my decisions.When they cut rates then i know currency falling and commoditie prices going up. Overall after last crash we had dead CAT bounce all over the market. It means that probably 4th quarter we gona have bigger crash.bigger crash Will do the "qt" and usd,gbp,EUR all of them Will be strong. Thus your trading understanding may have reached a broad knowledge stage, as you mentioned geopolitical issues that can pressure currency and increase commodity assets. Forex trading, as I know, usually buys foreign currency and indeed this is much easier to do because we can see developments in the world economy through several events as a reference for the right time to go short or long. But if that's what you mean, why should you invite the community to join your group.Unless you are trying to provide evidence of the success you have had and maybe some people will trust you. In recent years in my country there have been many fraud cases involving investing in forex and until now there has been no resolution from the leader inviting people to join it and most of them escape responsibility.

comments.author: pawel7777
comments.body: Quote from: Citycapital on July 24, 2023, 04:47:15 PMIt's good to connect Same mind people...dont you think that ? I like to speculate on the markets Im looking for Same.We can teach and improve each other.Sure, but how often do you connect with complete strangers from the internet and dedicate a big chunk of your time to them? Especially if you're talking about people with high level of expertise, who tend to highly value their time.It'd be much easier to connect to them if you build some reputation first, i.e. by showing your knowledge on public forums.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: Nobody will join your  WhatsApp group because we don't know if you have the quality that you claim to have. You should prove to forum users first that you are such smart person with the same goal toward successful trading by sharing ideas and so on. You should try and grow your account,we have a trading discussion board where you will meet people of similar minds.Whatever that you want to ask or discuss will be given attention to because we have experts here. The forum is the best place to discuss with forum members and achieve your dreams. Your discussion here will attract people of similar minds to give you their attention. Chatting on WhatsApp is no longer privacy because phone numbers will be used and also it does show any transparency in you.

comments.author: GeorgeJohn
comments.body: Their is something I want to let you understand op, it seems that you are new and maybe you have the pre knowledge of cryptocurrency trading and I will encourage you to establish your own without merging with people you don't know or tye one you know, sometimes merging with people to trade always bring misunderstandings between friends because they might experience lost and they will accused one that he made them to venture into lost, because in trading it requires decisions and that decisions shall be take and it may result negative or positive if the decision is been taken,so while I said that trade is for one individual not a combined effort is because of the disadvantages in trading so that when lose manifest nobody will be blame except yourself. And when mistakes occur you can easily identify it.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: GeorgeJohn on July 25, 2023, 08:20:49 PMThe purpose of this chat room Will be to have like my own small group of people like team to discuss together financial decisions to share knowledge with each others. Talking on the chat room on "live" it's much better sometimes then in the forum.But yes we could discuss things here aswell by reasoning things out with facts and theories.Your intentions are good but there are many groups that you can join that offer the same service you desire. Do you think these groups are not effective or do you have any special features that you want to include in your proposed group? This forum places so much importance on reputation. The forum should see you as a trustworthy member before you can come up with this suggestion. And reputation in this forum is earned by your positive contribution and your straightforwardness. I will suggest you stay here, increase your knowledge and build your reputation. You can ask questions about things you don't understand and we have competent hands in this forum that can give you the right answers.

comments.author: serveria.com
comments.body: Quote from: Citycapital on July 23, 2023, 01:22:23 PMHi, Im not here to tell anyone where to invest or how to invest or give any suggestions about financial decisions.Little bit about my background: I been trading crypto and Im self learner and i been learning about finances.I can make conclusions by looking the indicators and gepolitical events on the macro economical scale and i think it's wonderful.Im looking for people to connect and reach to success together by sharing ideas and knowledge and who knows maybe one day we could meet up or Even make our own hedge fund or large successful financial instution. Thank you so much guys  I think, as suggested by someone above, the best way would be to start posting here on bitcointalk. People will read your posts and it will become clear what are your intentions, skills, experience etc. And if your ideas are great I'm sure you'll find lots of fans and followers. Don't think many will join a Whatsapp group with unclear purposes as that would de-anonymize them.

comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: Quote from: Citycapital on July 24, 2023, 05:23:24 AMQuote from: Fullcoinese on July 24, 2023, 12:16:24 AMQuote from: Citycapital on July 23, 2023, 01:22:23 PMIm looking for people to connect and reach to success together by sharing ideas and knowledge and who knows maybe one day we could meet up or Even make our own hedge fund or large successful financial instution.I'd like to have conversations with others about finances and situation when we can make profit on forex commodities or with crypto.We could also share the new ideas together so Im looking for people like me the people who want to make money by analyzing the world and how it can have impact over the financial field.Btw.. it's always Nice to find and meet with people who's interested about same things.LET me tell one more time i don't want to sell anything or give any economy or financial predictions Im looking for people with who i can discuss about reasons not just give out ptedictions or suggestions to invest or buy anything.what is your true intention and purpose to gather traders and financial experts?. and why do you believe anyone wants or will join your invitation?.if your goal is to discuss and share knowledge in this forum you will even find thousands of people and thousands of minds who will be ready to discuss with you.why would you want to create a special chat room if you are free and can share in this forum?. i think chat rooms in particular are just going to limit participants and thoughts.just submit a statement or question here then let's discuss it together.The purpose of this chat room Will be to have like my own small group of people like team to discuss together financial decisions to share knowledge with each others. Talking on the chat room on "live" it's much better sometimes then in the forum.But yes we could discuss things here aswell by reasoning things out with facts and theories.I believe we should be more specific about the financial topic we want to discuss, avoiding unnecessary digressions. Let's get straight to the point.

comments.author: HajiBagi
comments.body: I'm sorry to say this, but I don't even comprehend the way your conversation is going. Are you here to learn something, or are you here to organise a group in another location to study business? In a forum, you can ask as many questions as you want to learn everything there is to know about cryptocurrencies and business in general. Regardless of the situation, you will always receive at least 90% of the answers to your queries. Because many forum users are not who you might assume they are, many of them have been active on the site for a long time and continue to do so in order to answer any questions new forum users may have regarding cryptocurrencies or managing your finances.I didn't see any reason for you to be looking for people to join your group for any other discussion or information because everything here is excellent for everyone, and I believe you should think carefully before posting anything here because most people will assume that you aren't in the forum to discuss worthwhile topics and many people will assume that you are in the forum to attract people's attention and con them. Even though forming a group is not a bad thing, it is best to do so with people you can trust and with whom you have a good relationship because if you try to work together to achieve financial goals without first getting to know each other, there will eventually be a misunderstanding.
